verses.verse: הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָ֡הּ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD הַלְלִ֥י <S%H1984><s%> Praise נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> O my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

אֲהַלְלָ֣ה <S%H1984><s%> will I praise יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּחַיָּ֑י <S%H2416><s%> While I live אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה <S%H2167><s%> I will sing praises לֵֽאלֹהַ֣י <S%H430><s%> unto my God בְּעוֹדִֽי׃ <S%H5750><s%> while

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּבְטְח֥וּ <S%H982><s%> Put not your trust בִנְדִיבִ֑ים <S%H5081><s%> in princes בְּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> [nor] in the son אָדָ֓ם ׀ <S%H120><s%> of man שֶׁ֤אֵֽין <S%H369><s%> there ל֥וֹ תְשׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H8668><s%> in whom [there is] no help

תֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> goeth forth ר֭וּחוֹ <S%H7307><s%> His breath יָשֻׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> he returneth לְאַדְמָת֑וֹ <S%H127><s%> to his earth בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that very day הַ֝ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אָבְד֥וּ <S%H6><s%> perish עֶשְׁתֹּנֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H6250><s%> his thoughts

אַשְׁרֵ֗י <S%H835><s%> Happy שֶׁ֤אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> [is he] that [hath] the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob בְּעֶזְר֑וֹ <S%H5828><s%> for his help שִׂ֝בְר֗וֹ <S%H7664><s%> whose hope עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is in יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] in the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> his God

עֹשֶׂ֤ה ׀ <S%H6213><s%> Which made שָׁ֘מַ֤יִם <S%H8064><s%> heaven וָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בָּ֑ם הַשֹּׁמֵ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> and all that therein [is] which keepeth אֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> truth לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

עֹשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> Which executeth מִשְׁפָּ֨ט ׀ <S%H4941><s%> judgment לָעֲשׁוּקִ֗ים <S%H6231><s%> for the oppressed נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> which giveth לֶ֭חֶם <S%H3899><s%> food לָרְעֵבִ֑ים <S%H7457><s%> to the hungry יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מַתִּ֥יר <S%H5425><s%> looseth אֲסוּרִֽים׃ <S%H631><s%> the prisoners

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD פֹּ֘קֵ֤חַ <S%H6491><s%> openeth עִוְרִ֗ים <S%H5787><s%> [the eyes of] the blind יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD זֹקֵ֣ף <S%H2210><s%> raiseth כְּפוּפִ֑ים <S%H3721><s%> them that are bowed down יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֹהֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> loveth צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <S%H6662><s%> the righteous

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD שֹׁ֘מֵ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> preserveth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גֵּרִ֗ים <S%H1616><s%> the strangers יָת֣וֹם <S%H3490><s%> the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֣ה <S%H490><s%> and widow יְעוֹדֵ֑ד <S%H5749><s%> he relieveth וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> but the way רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יְעַוֵּֽת׃ <S%H5791><s%> he turneth upside down

יִמְלֹ֤ךְ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְעוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever אֱלֹהַ֣יִךְ <S%H430><s%> [even] thy God צִ֭יּוֹן <S%H6726><s%> O Zion לְדֹ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> unto all וָדֹ֗ר <S%H1755><s%> generations הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
